title: NYPD Officer in Coma After Violent Arrest and Fatal Shooting of Suspect
text:
A New York Police Department officer was in a medically induced coma a day after a man struck him in the head with a metal chair during a violent confrontation in a nail salon that ended with the fatal shooting of the attacker, police officials said.

The uniformed officer was attacked Friday at about 5:40 p.m. while he and another officer were attempting to arrest a man who had an open warrant for trespassing and had been urinating inside a salon in the Brownsville section of Brooklyn, the officials said. During a struggle...
